${ModID}:Deconstruct.NAME: Deconstruct
${ModID}:Deconstruct.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Darken.NAME: Darken
${ModID}:Darken.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion. If the enemy has another debuff, apply !${ModID}:m2! more.

${ModID}:BurningAct.NAME: Burning Act
${ModID}:BurningAct.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 2 of them randomly.
${ModID}:BurningAct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 2 of them.

${ModID}:MindMaze.NAME: Mind Maze
${ModID}:MindMaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Put X *Dazed on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Deterioration.NAME: Deterioration
${ModID}:Deterioration.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust a random card in your discard pile and gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
${ModID}:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage for each time the enemy has lost HP this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage for each time the enemy has lost HP this turn. NL (Hits !M! time{!M!|1=|@=s}.)

${ModID}:Rue.NAME: Rue
${ModID}:Rue.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain [E] [E] and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust the next 3 cards you play.

${ModID}:Static.NAME: Static
${ModID}:Static.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. Apply ${ModID}:Distortion equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:CursedCircle.NAME: Cursed Circle
${ModID}:CursedCircle.DESCRIPTION: You and ALL enemies lose Strength equal to the number of cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:CursedCircle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You and ALL enemies lose Strength equal to the number of cards in your hand.
